attributes.action: Look into the Selling of personal details by the DVLA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has come to our attention that the DVLA are selling details about private individuals to companies. For a fee of £2.50 The selling of personal information is wrong and unfair an we call for the prime minister to look in to this and protect the personal information of individual citizens of the country he supports.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
